entries.title: Publications & Research - Central Bank of Malta
entries.text: The Central Bank of Malta's main publications are the Quarterly Review, the Annual Report and the Financial Stability Report.

entries.title: Statistics - Central Bank of Malta
entries.text: The Central Bank of Malta (the Bank) is responsible for the collection, compilation and dissemination of an array of statistics.

entries.title: Weekly Bulletin Report - Central Bank of Malta
entries.text: The Weekly Bulletin Report is published on a weekly basis and provides an overview on the developments in the local bond market that occurred during the ...

entries.title: Research Bulletin - Central Bank of Malta
entries.text: The Research Bulletin is an annual publication meant to showcase, in a concise and approachable manner, part of the Bank's research.

entries.title: Policy Notes 2024 - Central Bank of Malta
Macroprudential policy - Central Bank of Malta
entries.text: The main objective of macro-prudential policy is to reduce the build-up of risks in the financial sector and significant spill-overs to the real economy.

entries.title: Monetary policy - Central Bank of Malta
entries.text: The primary objective of monetary policy in the euro area is price stability, which implies avoiding prolonged inflation and deflation.
